entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
